spiritsExplanation: The primary spirit of this workout is 'High-Energy & Intense', scoring a 0.9 due to the clear emphasis on maintaining a high heart rate, with terms like 'high enough intensity', '85% of max heart rate', and 'sprints' used in the description. The video promises a fat-loss-focused HIIT routine that pushes limits, indicative of a high-energy, sweat-inducing workout. 'Structured & Disciplined' also scores a 0.7, reflecting the methodical approach to implementing work:rest ratios, and guidance on how to optimize results with scientific backing. The channel's focus on science-backed content supports this structured approach. 'Flow & Rhythm' and 'Soothing & Restorative' are not applicable here due to the high-intensity focus and lack of any recovery or rhythm-based elements.
